title: SubstitutionProvisions
description: Defines collateral substitution provisions such as how many and with how much notice are substitutions allowed.

noticeDeadlinePeriod.description: Defines the min period for notify of a substitution.

noticeDeadlineDateTime.description: A specific date and time for the notice deadline
